name: Shark Jump - Shark Run and Dash Eat Starfish Explorer and Adventure Fun Game
name_original: Shark Jump - Shark Run and Dash Eat Starfish Explorer and Adventure Fun Game
description:
Shark Jump is a fun dash and jump game.

Swim and jump in the ocean, collect starfish.
Avoid the crabs and the puffer fish !

How to Play -
* Tap to Jump
* Double tap to jump higher
* Collect Starfish
* Avoid puffers and crabs !

Collect enough starfish and you can upgrade the appearance of your shark and unlock new shark characters


----------------------------------------------------------------
This game contains In-App purchasing which allows you to buy starfish which can be spent on upgrading your shark. Starfish can also be collected in game without requiring purchase.
This game contains advertising. Advertising can be disabled by purchasing remove ads.
